document_data.name: Rice Candy
document_data.mainbody: '''Rice candies''' were a type of chewy [[candy]] from [[Shou Lung]]. They were available for purchase through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]''.
document_data.Description: Flavored with flower essences and exotic fruits which conferred them a tart taste, rice candies had a chewy and gelatinous texture. Candies purchased through ''Aurora's'' came in packages containing mixed assorted flavors.
document_data.Trivia: * The [[Faerûnian pantheon|Faerûnian deity]] [[Nobanion]] had a peculiar sentimental fondness for rice candies.
